e":"owner","type":"address"}],"name":"idOf","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"fid","type":"uint256"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[],"name":"name","outputs":[{"internalType":"string","name":"","type":"string"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"from","type":"address"},{"internalType":"address","name":"to","type":"address"},{"internalType":"uint256","name":"deadline","type":"uint256"},{"internalType":"bytes","name":"sig","type":"bytes"}],"name":"recover","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"from","type":"address"},{"internalType":"address","name":"to","type":"address"},{"internalType":"uint256","name":"recoveryDeadline","type":"uint256"},{"internalType":"bytes","name":"recoverySig","type":"bytes"},{"internalType":"uint256","name":"toDeadline","type":"uint256"},{"internalType":"bytes","name":"toSig","type":"bytes"}],"name":"recoverFor","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"fid","type":"uint256"}],"name":"recoveryOf","outputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"recovery","type":"address"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"to","type":"address"},{"internalType":"address","name":"recovery","type":"address"}],"name":"register","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"fid","type":"uint256"}],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"_idGateway","type":"address"}],"name":"setIdGateway","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"to","type":"address"},{"internalType":"uint256","name":"deadline","type":"uint256"},{"internalType":"bytes","name":"sig","type":"bytes"}],"name":"transfer","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"to","type":"address"},{"internalType":"address","name":"recovery","type":"address"},{"internalType":"uint256","name":"deadline","type":"uint256"},{"internalType":"bytes","name":"sig","type":"bytes"}],"name":"transferAndChangeRecovery","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"from","type":"address"},{"internalType":"address","name":"to","type":"address"},{"internalType":"address","name":"recovery","type":"address"},{"internalType":"uint256","name":"fromDeadline","type":"uint256"},{"internalType":"bytes","name":"fromSig","type":"bytes"},{"internalType":"uint256","name":"toDeadline","type":"uint256"},{"internalType":"bytes","name":"toSig","type":"bytes"}],"name":"transferAndChangeRecoveryFor","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"from","type":"address"},{"internalType":"address","name":"to","type":"address"},{"internalType":"uint256","name":"fromDeadline","type":"uint256"},{"internalType":"bytes","name":"fromSig","type":"bytes"},{"internalType":"uint256","name":"toDeadline","type":"uint256"},{"internalType":"bytes","name":"toSig","type":"bytes"}],"name":"transferFor","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"custodyAddress","type":"address"},{"internalType":"uint256","name":"fid","type":"uint256"},{"internalType":"bytes32","name":"digest","type":"bytes32"},{"internalType":"bytes","name":"sig","type":"bytes"}],"name":"verifyFidSignature","outputs":[{"internalType":"bool","name":"isValid","type":"bool"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"}],"devdoc":{"errors":{"GatewayFrozen()":[{"details":"Revert when the gateway dependency is permanently frozen."}],"HasId()":[{"details":"Revert when the destination must be empty but has an fid."}],"HasNoId()":[{"details":"Revert when the caller must have an fid but does not have one."}],"Unauthorized()":[{"details":"Revert when the caller does not have the authority to perform the action."}]},"events":{"AdminReset(uint256)":{"details":"Emit an event when the migration admin resets an fid.","params":{"fid":"The reset fid."}},"ChangeRecoveryAddress(uint256,address)":{"details":"Emit an event when a Farcaster ID's recovery address changes. It is possible for this      event to emit multiple times in a row with the same recovery address.","params":{"id":"The fid whose recovery address was changed.","recovery":"The new recovery address."}},"FreezeIdGateway(address)":{"details":"Emit an event when the contract owner permanently freezes the IdGateway address.","params":{"idGateway":"The permanent IdGateway address."}},"Recover(address,address,uint256)":{"details":"Emit an event when an fid is recovered.","params":{"from":"The custody address that previously owned the fid.","id":"The fid that was recovered.","to":"The custody address that now owns the fid."}},"Register(address,uint256,address)":{"details":"Emit an event when a new Farcaster ID is registered.      Hubs listen for this and update their address-to-fid mapping by adding `to` as the      current owner of `id`. Hubs assume the invariants:      1. Two Register events can never emit with the same `id`      2. Two Register(alice, ..., ...) cannot emit unless a Transfer(alice, bob, ...) emits          in between, where bob != alice.","params":{"id":"The fid that was registered.","recovery":"The address that can initiate a recovery request for the fid.","to":"The custody address that owns the fid"}},"SetIdCounter(uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Emit an event when the migration admin sets the idCounter.","params":{"newCounter":"The new idCounter value.","oldCounter":"The previous idCounter value."}},"SetIdGateway(address,address)":{"details":"Emit an event when the contract owner sets a new IdGateway address.","params":{"newIdGateway":"The new IdGateway address.","oldIdGateway":"The old IdGateway address."}},"Transfer(address,address,uint256)":{"details":"Emit an event when an fid is transferred to a new custody address.      Hubs listen to this event and atomically change the current owner of `id`      from `from` to `to` in their address-to-fid mapping. Hubs assume the invariants:      1. A Transfer(..., alice, ...) cannot emit if the most recent event for alice is         Register (alice, ..., ...)      2. A Transfer(alice, ..., id) cannot emit unless the most recent event with that id is         Transfer(..., alice, id) or Register(alice, id, ...)","params":{"from":"The custody address that previously owned the fid.","id":"The fid that was transferred.","to":"The custody address that now owns the fid."}}},"kind":"dev","methods":{"changeRecoveryAddress(address)":{"params":{"recovery":"The address which can recover the fid. Set to 0x0 to disable recovery."}},"changeRecoveryAddressFor(address,address,uint256,bytes)":{"params":{"deadline":"Expiration timestamp of the ChangeRecoveryAddress signature.","owner":"Custody address of the fid whose recovery address will be changed.","recovery":"The address which can recover the fid. Set to 0x0 to disable recovery.","sig":"EIP-712 ChangeRecoveryAddress message signed by the owner address."}},"recover(address,address,uint256,bytes)":{"params":{"deadline":"Expiration timestamp of params.recovery: The address which can recover the fid. Set to 0x0 to disable recovery.

params.deadline: Expiration timestamp of the ChangeRecoveryAddress signature.
params.owner: Custody address of the fid whose recovery address will be changed.
params.recovery: The address which can recover the fid. Set to 0x0 to disable recovery.
params.sig: EIP-712 ChangeRecoveryAddress message signed by the owner address.

params.from: The address that currently owns the fid.
params.sig: EIP-712 Transfer signature signed by the to address.
params.to: The address to transfer the fid to.

params.from: The owner address of the fid to transfer.
params.recoveryDeadline: Expiration timestamp of the recovery signature.
params.recoverySig: EIP-712 Transfer signature signed by the recovery address.
params.to: The address to transfer the fid to.
params.toDeadline: Expiration timestamp of the to signature.
params.toSig: EIP-712 Transfer signature signed by the to address.

params.sig: EIP-712 Transfer signature signed by the to address.
params.to: The address to transfer the fid to.

params.sig: EIP-712 Transfer signature signed by the to address.
params.to: The address to transfer the fid to.

params.from: The owner address of the fid to transfer.
params.fromDeadline: Expiration timestamp of the from signature.
params.fromSig: EIP-712 Transfer signature signed by the from address.
params.to: The address to transfer the fid to.
params.toDeadline: Expiration timestamp of the to signature.
params.toSig: EIP-712 Transfer signature signed by the to address.

params.from: The owner address of the fid to transfer.
params.fromDeadline: Expiration timestamp of the from signature.
params.fromSig: EIP-712 Transfer signature signed by the from address.
params.to: The address to transfer the fid to.
params.toDeadline: Expiration timestamp of the to signature.
params.toSig: EIP-712 Transfer signature signed by the to address.

params.custodyAddress: The address to check the signature of.
params.fid: The fid to check the signature of.

VERSION().notice: Contract version specified in the Farcaster protocol version scheme.

changeRecoveryAddress(address).notice: Change the recovery address of the fid owned by the caller.

changeRecoveryAddressFor(address,address.notice: Change the recovery address of fid owned by the owner. Caller must provide an         EIP-712 ChangeRecoveryAddress message signed by the owner.

custodyOf(uint256).notice: Maps each fid to the address that currently owns it.

freezeIdGateway().notice: Permanently freeze the IdGateway address. Only callable by owner.

gatewayFrozen().notice: Whether the IdGateway address is permanently frozen.

idCounter().notice: The last Farcaster id that was issued.

idGateway().notice: Address of the IdGateway, an address allowed to register fids.

idOf(address).notice: Maps each address to an fid, or zero if it does not own an fid.

name().notice: Defined for compatibility with tools like Etherscan that detect fid         transfers as token transfers. This is intentionally lowercased.

recover(address,address,uint256,bytes).notice: Transfer the fid from the from address to the to address. Must be called by the         recovery address. A signed message from the to address must be provided.

recoverFor(address,address,uint256,bytes.notice: Transfer the fid owned by the from address to another address that does not         have an fid. Caller must provide two signed Transfer messages: one signed by         the recovery address and one signed by the to address.

recoveryOf(uint256).notice: Maps each fid to an address that can initiate a recovery.

register(address,address).notice: Registers an fid to the given address and sets up recovery.         May only be called by the configured IdGateway address.

setIdGateway(address).notice: Set the IdGateway address allowed to register fids. Only callable by owner.

transfer(address,uint256,bytes).notice: Transfer the fid owned by this address to another address that does not have an fid.         A signed Transfer message from the destination address must be provided.

transferAndChangeRecovery(address,addres.notice: Transfer the fid owned by this address to another address that does not have an fid,         and change the fid's recovery address to the provided recovery address. This function         can be used to safely receive an fid from an untrusted address.         A signed TransferAndChangeRecovery message from the destination address including the         new recovery must be provided.

transferAndChangeRecoveryFor(address,add.notice: Transfer the fid owned by the from address to another address that does not         have an fid, and change the fid's recovery address to the provided recovery         address. This can be used to safely receive an fid transfer from an untrusted         address. Caller must provide two signed TransferAndChangeRecovery messages:         one signed by the from address and one signed by the to address.

transferFor(address,address,uint256,byte.notice: Transfer the fid owned by the from address to another address that does not         have an fid. Caller must provide two signed Transfer messages: one signed by         the from address and one signed by the to address.

verifyFidSignature(address,uint256,bytes.notice: Verify that a signature was produced by the custody address that owns an fid.
